title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Meet the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve Coffee Maker in Black – simple, fast, and easy on space.

What you’ll love:
- Easy buttons: Just add water, pop in a K-Cup pod, press a button. No complicated menus.
- Quick coffee: Brews a fresh cup in under a minute.
- Your cup, your way: Choose 6, 8, or 10 ounces.
- Small and tidy: Slim 8-inch width fits on most counters.
- Easy to fill: 36-ounce water tank means you can make several cups before refilling. The tank lifts off for simple refills.
- Less mess: Removable drip tray catches spills and can hold a full accidental brew. Remove it to fit travel mugs up to 7 inches tall.
- Saves energy: Turns itself off after 2 hours.
- Hot water on demand: Make tea, oatmeal, or instant soup without a kettle.
- Smart Start: Heats and then brews in one go—just press brew and relax.

Good to know:
- Works with all standard K-Cup pods. Some models also work with the Keurig My K-Cup reusable filter (packaging may vary).
- Black color. Compact design.

Simple steps to use:
1) Fill the water tank.
2) Place a K-Cup pod in the holder and close the lid.
3) Press your cup size (6, 8, or 10 oz).
4) Enjoy your coffee in under a minute.

If you want a dependable, no-fuss coffee maker that’s quick and simple, the Keurig K-Compact is a great choice.
